analysis.description:
Grass.buyFor (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#172-179) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- addr.transfer(1000000000000000) (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#179)

Grass.buyFor (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#172-179) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- addr.balance == 0

Grass.buyInternal (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#223-267) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < 1522357200 && bonuses[addr][today] == 0 (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#259-262)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of Grass.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#139) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_day' of Grass.getTokensPerDay (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#288-290) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_days' of Grass.returnTokensInPool (/unique_chucks/10/0x42f0d280e1f4fb064650653445a3c904e61f64b1.sol#308) is not in mixedCase
